Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.11601906]Frog Virus 3(FV3):inhibition of FV3 infection in fathead minnow(FHM) cells(90% inhibition at 500 µM);Channel Catfish virus(CCV):inhibition of CCV infection in catfish ovary(CCO) cells(99% inhibition at 50 µM).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information found in the reference(s) presented
Sequence Information.C-terminal Modification: Cyclization of a C-terminal Cys residue (forming a disulfide bond)
Sequence Information.Comments: No comments found on DRAMP database

Literature.Author: Chinchar VG, Wang J, Murti G, Carey C, Rollins-Smith L.
